bibl.title: Studia Evangelica. Papers Presented to the International Congress on "The Four Gospels in 1957" Held at Christ Church, Oxford, 1957
bibl.note: Aland Kurt, The Present Position of New Testament Textual Criticism.

Studia Evangelica. Papers Presented to the International Congress on "The Four Gospels in 1957" Held at Christ Church, Oxford, 1957 = Texte und Untersuchungen zur Geschichte der altchristlichen Literatur. 73 (Berlin, 1959) pp. 717-731.
